comments.raw_text: The Glean logo in the article preview on https://blog.mozilla.org/data is getting cropped (probably due to the aspect ratio). We should fix this.. and probably switch to the glean logo with a white background

comments.text: I uploaded a [new media](http://blog.mozilla.org/data/files/2020/02/sticker1_squared.png) that can be used as "featured image" so that it crops nicely when previewing it.
